original_text: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.
korean_text: 보상을 얻으려고 친구를 비난하는 자는 그의 자손들의 눈이 멀게 되리라

sentences.original_text: He that speaketh flattery to his friends
even the eyes of his children shall fail
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 그 자식의 눈도 멀게 되리라
